title: Mid-Season Changes Query (Titanic Hydra)
body:
With the changes coming through I noticed someone spoke of Sterak's Gage in the initial item changes post and see that there have been changes made *applause* whether it was due to reading that comment or already accounted for.  

What I wonder, is whether the eye that shifted over Sterak's Gage also glanced over Titanic Hydra in its hp scaling, as a reduced health-pool would obviously mean less overall damage from its passive. Fair enough if it's felt Titanic is a little strong at the moment or the interaction between stoneplate and titanic is too much of a logistical nightmare to deal with until stats have come through. Just a possibly annoying friendly reminder :P
